name: Hidden object: Paradise garden mystery pro
name_original: Hidden object: Paradise garden mystery pro
description:
Hidden object games are one of the most played games online and offline. All you need to do is concentrate on objects listed and find objects from list.

This search and find games are very easy to play with. For example, look at the screen, tap on the object and complete the scene you are investigating. Seek and find the object and you will unlock the next level for more hidden object fun.

Have guts to solve mystery solving puzzles? Yes! Then you are at right place. Find the hidden objects and be a detective. This games are also called as games for detective. Detectives always play mystery solving games and implement in their real life

Download this games on your tablet and phone and have unlimited fun in mystery solving journey!
